title: Two Nominations Sent to the Senate Today â€“ The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
July 27, 2017
NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:D. Michael Hurst, Jr., of Mississippi, to be United States Attorney for the Southern District of Mississippi for the term of four years, vice Gregory K. Davis, resigned.William C. Lamar, of Mississippi, to be United States Attorney for the Northern District of Mississippi for the term of four years, vice Felicia C. Adams, resigned.
